## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-bugfix-safari-id-destructuring-collision-in-function-expression
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/plugin-bugfix-safari-id-destructuring-collision-in-function-expression --dev
```
